abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33298617, pmid33287821, pmid33428790, pmid33434269, pmid33393329, pmid33136157, pmid33428455, pmid33399504, pmid33289923, pmid32897660, pmid33269805, pmid33277384, pmid33180097, pmid33428110, pmid33298508, pmid33253527, pmid33055254, pmid33397546, pmid33420022, pmid33400345
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2021.01.18
